file_content.text: Should we really be upsetting those p-pirates? They sound very d-dangerous...
Please, Jedi, we s-said we were sorry about Attis Station! D-don't be too angry!
Balmorra must be d-dreadful. B-bombings? Air raids? How do they s-stand it?
The Erigorm Bureaucracy said th-this assignment would be good for my n-nerves. Ha!
P-pardon me, Jedi. The Erigorm Bureaucracy just sent m-more work.
